unlink.name: unlink
unlink.description: Unlinks your Discord account from linked Minecraft server account.

responses.not_linked: Your account is not linked to any Minecraft account.
responses.no_permission: You do not have permission to unlink your account.
responses.success: Your account has been unlinked successfully

unlink.name: unlink
unlink.description: Unlinks selected account from linked Minecraft server account.

responses.not_linked: Selected user's account is not linked.
responses.success: Selected user's has been unlinked successfully.

responses.not_linked: Selected user's account is not linked.
responses.success: Selected user's has been synced successfully.
responses.success_all: All roles have been resynced successfully.

status.name: status
status.descriptions: Displays current the status of the server.
